info.author: RedTurtle Technology
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

The installation of iw.fss (FileSystemStorage) product in Plone doesn't enable this storage type
for basic Plone content types.

This product simply does this for news, files and images!

Credits
=======

 * Mirco Angelini (mirco.angelini AT redturtle DOT net)
 * Luca Fabbri (luca.fabbri AT redturtle DOT net)


Changelog
=========

1.0.1
-----

 * Removed unused stuff (you don't need to install this in Plone)
 
 * Fixed some docs infos.

1.0.0 - Unreleased
------------------

 * Initial release
info.keywords: iw fss plone storage file image
info.name: redturtle.fss
info.summary: Simply apply FileSystemStorage strategies (iw.fss) to basic Plone content types.
info.html_description:
Introduction

The installation of iw.fss (FileSystemStorage) product in Plone doesn’t enable this storage type for basic Plone content types.

This product simply does this for news, files and images!

Credits

  • Mirco Angelini (mirco.angelini AT redturtle DOT net)
  • Luca Fabbri (luca.fabbri AT redturtle DOT net)

Changelog

1.0.1

  • Removed unused stuff (you don’t need to install this in Plone)
  • Fixed some docs infos.

1.0.0 - Unreleased

  • Initial release
